participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Ethan is responsible and caring, especially towards his dog Barnaby. He values loyalty and enjoys a steady routine.
participant_1.background: i've a german shepherd named barnaby. i am employed by the us postal service. my father drove a car for nascar. my favorite color is grey.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Jason is resilient and creative, navigating the challenges of single parenthood while pursuing his passion for music production.
participant_2.background: i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. whats up i am a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. i'm a recording engineer and own my own studio.
